expression:
//set the benchtop variable to use later
$benchtop_colour =$$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Benchtops/Ensuite/item$$

$total = 0
FOREACH %%Quantities/BillRecord%% IN %%Quantities%% ,
    IF %%Quantities/BillRecord/ItemCode%% == "700.IFC.BWK.Set.Partition.GF"
    THEN $total = $total + %%Quantities/BillRecord/Quantity%%
    ENDIF 
NEXT

SWITCH($benchtop_colour,
  CASE "20mm Cotton White", EXPORT("106.01673", 1, 102, 1, 1, $benchtop_colour)
  CASE "20mm Iceland", EXPORT("106.0156", 1, 101, 1, 1, $benchtop_colour)
  EXPORT("106.123", $total, 103, 1, 1, $benchtop_colour)
)

IF
 $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Style & Size/Ensuite/item$$
== "Lifestyle 1.7m" 
THEN 
//set the benchtop variable to use later
$benchtop_colour =$$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Benchtops/Ensuite/item$$

EXPORT(106.0156, 1, 105, 1, 1, $benchtop_colour)

EXPORT(106.0156, 1, 106, 1, 1, $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Benchtops/Ensuite/item$$)
EXPORT(106.0156, 1, 107, 1, 1, "text " & @benchtop)
ENDIF

IF
 $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Style & Size/Ensuite/item$$
== "Lifestyle 1.7m" 
AND
$$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Benchtops/Ensuite/item$$
== "20mm Iceland"

THEN 
@benchtop = $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Benchtops/Ensuite/item$$
EXPORT(106.0156, 1, 104, 1, 1, "test")
ENDIF

note: test for each loop (ceiling cornice sum)
expression:
$total = 0
FOREACH %%Quantities/BillRecord%% IN %%Quantities%% ,
    IF %%Quantities/BillRecord/ItemCode%% == "700.IFC.Ceiling.Cornice01"
    THEN $total = $total + %%Quantities/BillRecord/Quantity%%
    ENDIF 
NEXT
EXPORT(106.333, $total, 108, 1, 1, "text for ceiling")

note: test for each loop (brick internal partition)
expression:
$total = 0
FOREACH %%Quantities/BillRecord%% IN %%Quantities%% ,
    IF %%Quantities/BillRecord/ItemCode%% == "700.IFC.BWK.Set.Partition.GF"
    THEN $total = $total + %%Quantities/BillRecord/Quantity%%
    ENDIF 
NEXT
EXPORT("106.333", $total, 108, 1, 1, "text for quantities")

note: WORKING - Loop trough quantities and join texts (door frames)
expression:
//start variables
$total = 0
$workup = ""


//loop trough all single doorframes AND sum quantity, join description(workup)
FOREACH %%Quantities/BillRecord%% IN %%Quantities%% ,
    IF %%Quantities/BillRecord/ItemCode%% == "800.Da001" 
    THEN 
        $total = $total + %%Quantities/BillRecord/Quantity%%
        $workup = $workup & char(10) & %%Quantities/BillRecord/XDescription%%
    ENDIF 
NEXT

//now check selections for frame type
$frame_type = $$Choices/Joinery/Joinery - Internal/House/item$$
SWITCH($frame_type,
  CASE "Deluxe Metal Door Frame", EXPORT("054.200D", $total, 54, 1, 1, $workup)
  CASE "Regal Metal Door Frame", EXPORT("054.200R", $total, 54, 1, 1, $workup)
)

//also export labour fees
EXPORT("105.23", $total, 105, 1, 1, "fixie")
EXPORT("151.255", $total, 151, 1, 1, "painter")

note: Loop trough quantities and join texts dynamic ItemCode (door frames)
expression:
//start variables
$total = 0
$workup = ""

//now check selections for frame type
$frame_type = $$Choices/Joinery/Joinery - Internal/House/item$$
SWITCH($frame_type,
  CASE "Deluxe Metal Door Frame", $frame = ".D")
  CASE "Regal Metal Door Frame", $frame = ".R")
)

//loop trough all single doorframes AND sum quantity, join description(workup)
FOREACH %%Quantities/BillRecord%% IN %%Quantities%% ,
  IF %%Quantities/BillRecord/ItemCode%% == "800.Da001" 
    THEN 
    $wc = ""
    $hand = ""
    $total = $total + %%Quantities/BillRecord/Quantity%%
    $workup = %%Quantities/BillRecord/XDescription%%
      //chack IF WA framing
      IF contains($workup, "WC") THEN $wc = ".WC" ENDIF 
      //define handing
      IF contains($workup, "RH") THEN $hand = ".RH" ENDIF 
      IF contains($workup, "LH") THEN $hand = ".LH" ENDIF 
    EXPORT("054.200" & $frame & $hand & $wc, 1, 105, 1, 1, $workup)
  ENDIF 
NEXT

//also export labour fees
EXPORT("105.200", $total, 105, 1, 1, "fixie")
EXPORT("151.255", $total, 151, 1, 1, "painter")
